name: Where Are You? (noattendance)
description:
Created by Team Positive Vibes for the Global Games Jam 2021. For the Theme: Lost and Found. We challenged ourselves to stay true to the 48hr deadline [there abouts]

Credits for those involved :

Blueprinting : Freya Stanley - Niall Colvin [https://dniall101.itch.io/]

3D Assets & Music : Connor Minter

All 2D Art Work : Athina Giannoulatos - Alessandra Mukasa - Freya Stanley

Sound Effects : Freesound.org
